tool_description: Calculates comprehensive financial ratios used in business valuation and financial analysis.
error_messages: Invalid financial inputs: Core financial metrics must be numeric and non-null.
Zero denominator: Cannot calculate ratios with zero denominators (equity, assets, etc.).
Negative equity: Negative equity may indicate financial distress requiring special analysis.
Data consistency: Financial inputs should be consistent and from same period.
usage: Input key financial statement figures. Tool calculates standard financial ratios used in valuation and analysis.

profitability_ratios.description: Key profitability ratios (margins, ROE, ROA, etc.)
